intro:
That Aha! moment feels so refreshing!
A new kind of brain-training puzzle using letters and clever thinking
description:
Compare the characters on the top and bottom, and find the one that’s different—before time runs out!
This brain-training game challenges your powers of observation and focus.

How to play is super simple:
・Start by carefully examining the characters on the top of the screen
・Then, look at the characters below and spot the one that’s different
・Once you find it, tap on it!

It may seem easy at first glance, but the time limit adds a surprising challenge!
Perfect for a quick brain workout during your free time.

Can’t find the answer? Use the hint button!
It will subtly point you toward the odd character—so don’t give up and keep going!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
